Unnamed: 0: This data consists of real patient reviews submitted to webMD from 2007 - 2020. This is a subset of a public dataset which can be found at https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/rohanharode07/webmd-drug-reviews-dataset

Unnamed: 1: A collection of drug reviews from patients being treated for Rheumatoid Arthritis
A collection of drug reviews from patients being treated for Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
A collection of drug reviews from patients being treated for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease

Unnamed: 2: A description of the disease/condition the patient was using the drug to treat
The date of the review. Sept 2007- March 2020
The name of the drug being reviewed
The id number of the drug being reviewed
A rating from the patient on the ease of use of the drug. Range 1 - 5 where 5 is best and 1 is worst
A rating from the patient on the effectiveness of the drug. Range 1 - 5 where 5 is best and 1 is worst
A rating from the patient on thir overall satisfaction with the drug. Range 1 - 5 where 5 is best and 1 is worst
The biological sex of the patient. Possible values: Male, Female. Can be left blank.
A list of known side effects associated with the drug
